---
title: Pre-submission checklist
---

::: grid
::: g-col-7
If you wish to submit your data to BigPicture Sweden, there are several things
you can prepare before you start with the actual submission. Use the
checklist below to ensure that you have everything you need to succeed
with your submission. If you have any questions, please write to the
[BigPicture Sweden Helpdesk](mailto:{{< var email.helpdesk >}}).
:::

::: g-col-5
![](../images/undraw_checklist.png)
:::
:::

-   Consider which data you would like to share via BigPicture Sweden. The
    submission process will be less complicated if you know which files
    to include in your submission.
-   Determine [if BigPicture Sweden is the right
    archive](is-bp-sweden-the-right-archive.qmd) for your data.
-   Find out what is needed in order to [comply with
    GDPR](complying-with-gdpr.qmd).
-   Make sure that your [ethical approval](ethical-approval.qmd) allows
    the data to be shared via BigPicture Sweden.
-   [Prepare your data files](preparing-data.qmd) so that they are ready
    to be submitted.

::: grid
::: g-col-2
:::
:::
